name: Christmas Mini-Workshop Sunday Nov 17th (Morning)
description: We love the holiday season but finding useful and personalized gifts can be a source of stress. Allow SeaBerry to help you during these jolly times! During this mini-workshop (2h) you will learn hands-on how to create customized skincare with kind ingredients that will be ideal to add to any stocking. Or put a couple of these products in a beautiful packaging for a custom-made gift that will surely impress. Discover: • The properties and uses of various oils, butters, and plants • The theory behind some skincare formulations • The tools and techniques for making gentle skincare products Create: • Sunshine Lip Balms – With hemp seed oil, it is the ideal tube balm to use throughout the day • Restorative Bath Soaks – An indulgent mix of flowers, grains, salts, and more, that helps the body relax and unwind Take Home: • A handout of the recipes with colour photos and ingredients featured in the workshop • 6 lip balm tubes and 6 bath soaks individually packaged in beautiful muslin bags (a $40 retail value) • The knowledge to create these products at home When? Sunday Morning November 17th, 10:00am-12:00pm Where? Anna Templeton Centre, 278 Duckworth Street, St. John’s, NL Cost: $50 (before November 8) $60 (from November 8 on) *all materials, fees, and taxes included* Space is Limited! Contact: hello@seaberrystudios.ca NOTE: The workshop will take place in a space where various chemicals were used to complete different dye processes. Although the space will be thoroughly cleaned before the workshop, if you are pregnant, breastfeeding, or have certain allergies and/or sensitivities, there is a small risk of exposure. Please contact us if you have any questions.
